title: Cattle Foot-and-Mouth Vaccination
description: Immunization to protect cattle against foot-and-mouth disease.

facility.name: On-site service
facility.details: Delivery and administration at your farm.

animal_drug.name: FMD-Guard Vaccine
animal_drug.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Vaccine
animal_drug.description: Inactivated vaccine for prevention of foot-and-mouth disease in cattle.

title: Sheep & Goat Deworming
description: Treatment against internal parasites in sheep and goats.

facility.name: Safe for Pregnancy
facility.details: Approved for use in pregnant animals.

animal_drug.name: Albendazole Paste
animal_drug.title: Broad-Spectrum Dewormer
animal_drug.description: Effective against nematodes, trematodes, and cestodes in small ruminants.

title: Poultry Respiratory Treatment
description: Treatment for common respiratory illnesses in poultry flocks.

animal_drug.name: Tylosin Soluble Powder
animal_drug.title: Macrolide Antibiotic
animal_drug.description: Effective for treating respiratory and enteric infections in poultry.

title: Cattle Mastitis Intramammary Treatment
description: Localized treatment for udder infections in dairy cows.

animal_drug.name: Cloxacillin Intramammary Cream
animal_drug.title: Mastitis Therapy
animal_drug.description: Targeted antibiotic therapy for bacterial mastitis in dairy cattle.

title: Swine Parvovirus Vaccination
description: Vaccination to prevent porcine parvovirus-induced reproductive issues.

animal_drug.name: PorciShield Parvo Vaccine
animal_drug.title: Swine Parvovirus Vaccine
animal_drug.description: Inactivated vaccine preventing reproductive failure in sows.

title: Calf Scour Electrolyte Therapy
description: Rehydration treatment for calves suffering from diarrhea (scours).

animal_drug.name: CalfRehydrate Mix
animal_drug.title: Oral Electrolyte Solution
animal_drug.description: Balanced electrolyte mix with vitamins to support calf recovery.

title: Equine Joint Supplement Therapy
description: Supports joint health and mobility in horses via injectable supplement.

animal_drug.name: HyalurEase IV
animal_drug.title: Joint Hyaluronic Acid Supplement
animal_drug.description: Restores joint lubrication and relieves arthritic symptoms in horses.

title: Beef Cattle Bovine Respiratory Complex (BRC) Vaccination
description: Combo vaccine to prevent multiple respiratory pathogens in beef cattle.

animal_drug.name: RespiraShield Multi-Vac
animal_drug.title: BRC Multivalent Vaccine
animal_drug.description: Protects against BRD pathogens including IBR, BVD, and PI3.

title: Rabbit Coccidiosis
description: Treatment for intestinal coccidiosis in rabbits via oral medication.

facility.name: Flavor-Masked
facility.details: Pellets are easy for rabbits to ingest.

animal_drug.name: CoccidiClear Pellets
animal_drug.title: Rabbit Coccidiosis Remedy
animal_drug.description: Contains sulfa drug mixture effective against coccidia in rabbits.

title: Fish Pond Antiparasitic Treatment
description: Treatment for external and internal parasites in aquaculture ponds.

animal_drug.name: AquaMectin Concentrate
animal_drug.title: Aquatic Antiparasitic
animal_drug.description: Targets flukes and protozoans in fish ponds safely.
